    • getIDNames

      public static Map<String,String> getIDNames(String projectId, Constants.QMLevel QMLevel)
      Get the IDs and names of all the existing entities in each QMLevel.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      QMLevel - The QMLevel (metrics, factors or strategic_indicators).
      Returns:
      A Map of ID,name of the existing entities, for the given project and QMLevel.
